minCount: 1.message: You may be missing SSDTs. **[Click here for more information](https://dortania.github.io/OpenCore-Install-Guide/config.plist/clarkdale.html#acpi)**

Path: ^(?!(SSDT-OLARILA.aml)).message: Please create config by using **[Dortania's OC Install Guide](https://dortania.github.io/OpenCore-Install-Guide/)**. We (OC Web Utilities team) don't support MaLdon behavior nor his actions in OpenCore community. Please use VANILLA config instead and **ALWAYS** check dortania guide

Enabled: true.message: **{0}** ACPI is disabled. Please check if you need this ACPI and enable it if it's necessary

DevirtualiseMmio: false.message: **{0}** should be disabled if your MOBO doesn't require it

EnableSafeModeSlide: true.message: **{0}** should be disabled if it's Legacy or OpenCore log says otherwise

EnableWriteUnprotector: true.message: **{0}** must be disabled if it's Legacy

ProvideCustomSlide: true.message: **{0}** should be disabled if it's Legacy or OpenCore log says otherwise

RebuildAppleMemoryMap: false.message: **{0}** must be enabled if it's Legacy or macOS 10.7 and above

ResizeAppleGpuBars: -1.message: **{0}** should be set to **0** if your GPU supports Resizable Bar

SetupVirtualMap: false.message: **{0}** must be disabled if it's Legacy

minCount: 1.message: You may be missing Kexts. **[Click here for more information](https://dortania.github.io/OpenCore-Install-Guide/ktext.html#kexts)**

BundlePath: Lilu.kext.message: **{0}** isn't here. Please download it, place it in `OC/Kexts` and run `OC Snapshot` with **[ProperTree](https://github.com/corpnewt/ProperTree)** to add it properly into to your config

BundlePath: VirtualSMC.kext.message: **{0}** isn't here. Please download it, place it in `OC/Kexts` and run `OC Snapshot` with **[ProperTree](https://github.com/corpnewt/ProperTree)** to add it properly into to your config

BundlePath: WhateverGreen.kext.message: **{0}** isn't here. Please download it, place it in `OC/Kexts` and run `OC Snapshot` with **[ProperTree](https://github.com/corpnewt/ProperTree)** to add it properly into to your config

Enabled: true.message: **{0}** is disabled. Please follow **[Dortania's Gathering Files](https://dortania.github.io/OpenCore-Install-Guide/ktext.html)** subpage to check if this kext is needed for your hardware and enable it

AppleCpuPmCfgLock: false.message: **{0}** should be enabled if you have CFG-Lock enabled

AppleXcpmCfgLock: true.message: **{0}** should be enabled if you have CFG-Lock enabled

CustomSMBIOSGuid: false.message: **{0}** should be enabled if it's DELL or VIAO system

DisableIoMapper: false.message: **{0}** should be enabled if VT-D is enabled in BIOS

LapicKernelPanic: false.message: **{0}** should be enabled if it's HP system

XhciPortLimit: false.message:
**{0}** must be disabled for macOS 11.3+.
Note: To map USB ports on `Windows` you can use **[USBToolBox](https://github.com/USBToolBox/tool)**. Unfortunately, there is no `Linux` tool that allows to do it

AppleDebug: true.message: **{0}** should be enabled for debugging purposes

ApplePanic: true.message: **{0}** should be enabled if you want to log kernel panics to disk

DisableWatchDog: true.message: **{0}** should be enabled for debugging early boot issues

ScanPolicy: 0.message: **{0}** should be **{1}**. Please keep in mind that you would want to change this value to something more secure after installing macOS

SecureBootModel: Default.message: **{0}** should be **Disabled** if you want to use Nvidia Web Drivers

Vault: Optional.message: **{0}** should be **Enabled** if you want to enable OpenCore vaulting mechanism

MLB: ^(?!(M0000000000000001)).message: Please generate SMBIOS corresponding to model specified in config by using **[GenSMBIOS](https://github.com/corpnewt/GenSMBIOS)**

SystemSerialNumber: ^(?!(W00000000001)).message: Please generate SMBIOS corresponding to model specified in config by using **[GenSMBIOS](https://github.com/corpnewt/GenSMBIOS)**

SystemUUID: ^(?!(00000000-0000-0000-0000.message: Please generate SMBIOS corresponding to model specified in config by using **[GenSMBIOS](https://github.com/corpnewt/GenSMBIOS)**

minCount: 1.message: You may be missing Drivers. **[Click here for more information](https://dortania.github.io/OpenCore-Install-Guide/ktext.html#firmware-drivers)**

Path: (.*)HfsPlus.efi.message: **HfsPlus.efi** or **OpenHfsPlus.efi** isn't here. Please download it, place it in `OC/Drivers` and run `OC Snapshot` with **[ProperTree](https://github.com/corpnewt/ProperTree)** to add it properly into to your config

Path: OpenRuntime.efi.message: **{0}** isn't here. Please download it, place it in `OC/Drivers` and run `OC Snapshot` with **[ProperTree](https://github.com/corpnewt/ProperTree)** to add it properly into to your config

Path: ^(?!(OpenCore.efi)).message: **{0}** isn't supposed to be here. Please put it in root folder and run OC Snapshot with ProperTree
